channel.title: Posts on CodeOn! at Keck
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on CodeOn! at Keck

item.title: PIBBS Bootcamp: Data Viz and Plotting Biological Data
item.description: Are you a biologist with BIG data? Want to learn programming for the life sciences? Come join CodeOn! We’re a community of data science learners sharing skills among Keck students. We host gatherings every other week. Details below! PIBBS Bootcamp: Data Viz and Plotting Biological Data led by Ted Tseng and Duc Nguyen MCH 256 9:00am-11:00am Monday 2019-08-12 You can view Duc’s slides here

We host gatherings every other week. Details below! item.title: Introduction to the R Programming Language
item.description: Are you a biologist with more data than you know what to do with? Do you wish you were more familiar with common programming methods for the life sciences? Then come and join CodeOn! We’re a community of data science learners committed to developing computational skills among Keck students. We’re starting off the Spring 2019 semester with an introduction to the R programming language. We’ll be hosting gatherings every other week.

item.title: Review of Python Data Structures
item.description: Come and join CodeOn! and improve your coding for the new era Our second meeting will be: October 10th 5:30-6:30pm in NTT (Norman Topping Tower) 4444 Topic: Review of Python Data Structures Bring your laptop and programming questions! Can’t make it, but want to stay in touch? Contact us: keckcodeon@gmail.com
